name: Tobacco Flavorwise Stock Summary
query:
SELECT 
Flavor as 'Flavor:Data:250',
sum(MasterCase) as 'MC:Float:80',
SUM(Boxes_250) as 'Boxe(s)_250GM:Float:120',
SUM(Boxes_50) as 'Boxe(s)_50GM:Float:120',
SUM(Carton) as 'Carton(s):Float:100',
((sum(MasterCase)*6) + (SUM(Boxes_250)*0.25) + (SUM(Boxes_50)*0.05) + (SUM(Carton)*0.5)) 'Total Weight (Kg):Float:130'
from 
(
select 
item.item_code,
TRIM(SUBSTRING(item.item_code from 1 for  LOCATE('GM',item.item_code)+1)) as 'Flavor',
item.stock_uom as "UOM:Data:100",
item.weight_per_unit,
CASE 
	WHEN (ledger.stock_uom = 'BOX' AND item.weight_per_unit = 0.25)
	THEN round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2) DIV 24
	WHEN (ledger.stock_uom = 'BOX' AND item.weight_per_unit = 0.05)
	THEN round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2) DIV 120
	WHEN (ledger.stock_uom = 'CARTON' AND item.weight_per_unit = 0.5)
	THEN  round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2) DIV 12
 	WHEN (ledger.stock_uom = 'MASTER CASE' AND item.weight_per_unit = 6)
 	THEN round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2)
	ELSE 0
END
as "MasterCase",
CASE 
	WHEN (ledger.stock_uom = 'BOX' AND item.weight_per_unit = 0.25 AND coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0) DIV 24 = 0)
	THEN MOD(round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2), 24)
	ELSE 0
	END	 AS 'Boxes_250',
CASE 
	WHEN (ledger.stock_uom = 'BOX' AND item.weight_per_unit = 0.05 AND coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0) DIV 120 = 0)
	THEN MOD(round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2), 120)
	ELSE 0
	END	 AS 'Boxes_50',	
CASE WHEN (item.stock_uom = 'CARTON' AND item.weight_per_unit = 0.5 AND coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0) DIV 12 = 0)
		THEN  MOD(round(coalesce(sum(ledger.actual_qty),0),2), 12)
		ELSE 0
	END as 'Carton'
	from `tabBin` AS ledger
	INNER JOIN `tabItem` AS item
	ON ledger.item_code = item.item_code
	INNER JOIN `tabWarehouse` warehouse
	ON warehouse.name = ledger.warehouse
	WHERE  warehouse.company = 'Zomo America'
	AND item.item_group in (select name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group in ('TOBACCO'))
group by item.item_code, item.stock_uom ,item.weight_per_unit
) as FinalResult
GROUP BY Flavor
ORDER BY Flavor
